meanings.sent1: She relearns the dance routine after forgetting it.
meanings.sent2: He often relearns how to ride a bike every summer.
meanings.sent3: The cat relearns the trick of catching a toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The plant relearns to grow after a period of drought.
meanings.sent5: The student relearns the math concept with practice and patience.
